meta.siteDescription: SASA builds production-ready MERN apps, scraping pipelines, and Arabic OCR solutions.
meta.author: SASA

hero.name: SASA
hero.headline: MERN Developer & Automation Engineer
hero.subline: I build web apps, scrapers, and Arabic OCR pipelines to convert messy documents into reliable data.

about.short: I'm SASA — a MERN-stack developer and web-scraping specialist. I turn complex document workflows into maintainable systems.
about.long: I focus on full-stack web applications using MongoDB, Express, React, Node.js and on building scraping and OCR solutions (Tesseract / PyTorch / Paddle) for Arabic documents. I'm available for freelance work and consulting.

timeline.title: Started freelancing
timeline.detail: Signed first clients on Khamsat & Mostaqel.

timeline.title: OCR research
timeline.detail: Built pipelines for Arabic printed and handwritten digit extraction.

timeline.title: SaaS blueprint
timeline.detail: Designed a document automation SaaS for templated PDF generation.

timeline.title: DEPI Internship
timeline.detail: Software Engineering Intern at Ministry of Communication & Technology (Oct 2024 — Jun 2025).

education.institution: Higher Institute of Information Systems and Computer Science, 6th of October City

projects.title: Arabic Exam OCR Pipeline
projects.summary: Table detection + CNN classifier for Arabic handwritten digits to extract ranks and IDs from scanned PDFs.
projects.description: Built a pipeline that detects tables in scanned exam PDFs, segments cells, classifies handwritten Arabic digits, and stores the results in PostgreSQL. The pipeline includes a small web admin built with Node.js to review predictions.

projects.title: Gym Management System (MERN)
projects.summary: A complete MERN app for gym owners with membership plans, trainer assignment, and reporting.
projects.description: Multi-tenant gym management system supporting monthly/yearly subscriptions, trainer scheduling, and a printable member report export (PDF).

projects.title: Document Template Engine
projects.summary: Inject data into Word templates then export to PDF for official forms and certificates.
projects.description: Service to programmatically inject data into .docx templates, convert them to PDF, and return print-ready documents. Includes a small Solid/React front-end for uploads.

projects.title: Comforty — E-commerce Platform
projects.summary: Full-stack online store built with MERN to support user auth, product management, and order processing (in progress).
projects.description: Building a production-ready e-commerce store with clean admin flows and order lifecycle management.

projects.title: CRM System
projects.summary: Customer Relationship Management tool with NestJS and React to reduce data entry time.
projects.description: Built a CRM that reduced data entry time by 30% and improved client interaction tracking.

projects.title: Real-Time Sports Match Tracker
projects.summary: Playwright/Node.js based bot to track live match events and notify via channels.
projects.description: Developed a bot to track live sports matches, analyze results, and send instant notifications.

services.title: Web Applications
services.desc: Full-stack MERN applications, admin dashboards, and small SaaS.

services.title: Scraping & Automation
services.desc: Custom scraping pipelines using Playwright/Selenium with queueing & proxy support.

services.title: OCR & Document Automation
services.desc: Arabic OCR pipelines, table detection, and PDF generation.

testimonials.name: Fatma A.
testimonials.quote: SASA delivered a reliable OCR pipeline that saved our team hours of manual work every week.

testimonials.name: Omar H.
testimonials.quote: Fast, clear communication and a production-ready gym management system.
